headline: Will Northrop Grumman (NOC) Beat Estimates Again in Its Next Earnings Report?
summary: Northrop Grumman (NOC) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.
